com.mapquest.android.maps
Class DefaultItemizedOverlay

java.lang.Object
  com.mapquest.android.maps.Overlay
      com.mapquest.android.maps.ItemizedOverlay<OverlayItem>
          com.mapquest.android.maps.DefaultItemizedOverlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
Overlay.Snappable
public class DefaultItemizedOverlay
extends ItemizedOverlay<OverlayItem>

A simple, default concrete class extending ItemizedOverlay backed by a List.

onTap

public boolean onTap(GeoPoint p,
                     MapView mapView)
Description copied from class: ItemizedOverlay
Handles the screen tap and find the item containing the tap point. If the item is found, invokes the ItemizedOverlay.onTap(int) callback.

Overrides:
onTap in class ItemizedOverlay<OverlayItem>
Returns:
returns false by default
